CLASS.name: BETA BLOCKING AGENTS (EXCEPT ESMOLOL AND SOTALOL)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Disorders of autoregulation and conduction (suppression of the compensatory sympathetic mechanisms)

CLASS.name: BETA BLOCKING AGENTS (EXCEPT ESMOLOL AND SOTALOL)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Disorders of contractility, autoregulation, and electrical conduction (suppression of the compensatory sympathetic mechanisms)
